title: Podcast Episode 35.1 – WHEN SHE’S READY by Ruby Dixon
description:
Our audiobook this week
is WHEN SHE’S READY by Ruby Dixon! 



Narrated by Victoria Mei & Cary Hite



To
get amnesty on a remote farm planet, ex-con Tassar has to marry an alien –
specifically, a strange looking creature called a ‘human’. When he sees
gorgeous, delicate Leilani, though, all of his plans change. He wants more than
just a marriage of convenience. He wants her forever, but only when she’s ready.



WHEN SHE’S READY (ebook
preorder): Amazon: https://amzn.to/2MZ6n8q



Amazon Universal: https://geni.us/BqEP
